Posts.Content: Please help. I have a close fiend who needs help with a breast cancer issue...does anyone know a good breast cancer surgeon in colorado...a friend believes she has IBC...the most aggresive breast cancer and the doctor she spoke with gave her an appointment 3 weeks away... Also if you have any suggestions I can give her that would be amazing. Thank you so much in advance Melissa
Posts.Title: Looking for a Breast Surgeon...
